amendment.description: Amendment redirects funding within the Military Construction, Defense Wide account in order to increase funding for study, planning, design, and architect and engineer services by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect funding within the Military Construction, Defense Wide account in order to increase funding for study, planning, design, and architect and engineer services by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
